ourStory.title: OUR STORY
ourStory.subtitle: Get to know our story
ourStory.description: Founded on November 2, 2023, BloodHunts Gaming is an organization dedicated to bringing together players of Call of Duty Mobile, Warzone PC/Console, and Warzone Mobile. Our focus is on creating an inclusive community, valuing both competitive and casual gaming. We were born with the purpose of being a community/organization to share strategies, experiences, and above all, the passion for Call of Duty. We are always open to new members who want to contribute to our growing family, offering a welcoming environment for everyone. With plans to expand our horizons to other games in the future, BloodHunts Gaming is committed to being more than an organization: we are a community, a family, united by our love for games.

staff.title: STAFF
staff.subtitle: Meet our staff
staff.description: These are our representatives who enable BloodHunts Gaming to be present in the gaming world scene.
